hero.description: Smart task prioritization for workers and students using proven methods like the Eisenhower Matrix. Focus on what truly matters.

features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help you prioritize what matters most and achieve your goals efficiently.

smartPrioritization.title: Smart Task Prioritization
smartPrioritization.description: Leverage the Eisenhower Matrix to categorize tasks by urgency and importance. Know exactly what to tackle first.

timeEstimation.title: Accurate Time Estimation
timeEstimation.description: Get intelligent time estimates for your tasks based on complexity and historical data. Plan your day with confidence.

analytics.title: Productivity Analytics
analytics.description: Track your progress and understand your productivity patterns. Get insights to improve your workflow.

quickCapture.title: Quick Capture
quickCapture.description: Instantly capture tasks as they come to mind. Add context, deadlines, and priority with ease.

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
smartScheduling.description: Automatically organize your day based on priorities, deadlines, and available time slots.

flexibleWorkflows.title: Flexible Workflows
flexibleWorkflows.description: Customize your task management system to fit your unique workflow. Whether student or professional.

howItWorks.subtitle: Four simple steps to transform your productivity and take control of your tasks.

capture.title: Capture Your Tasks
capture.description: Quickly add all your tasks, assignments, and to-dos in one place. Include deadlines, context, and any relevant details.

estimate.title: Estimate Time & Priority
estimate.description: Get smart suggestions for time estimates and let our AI help you assess the urgency and importance of each task.

organize.title: Organize with Eisenhower Matrix
organize.description: Tasks are automatically categorized: Do First (urgent & important), Schedule (important), Delegate (urgent), or Eliminate (neither).

execute.title: Execute & Track Progress
execute.description: Focus on your prioritized tasks with a clear daily plan. Track your progress and adjust as needed to stay productive.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Productivity?
cta.subtitle: Join the community of workers and students mastering their tasks with Task Wise, an open source solution.
